add_colorbar(canvas, cax, cbartype='continuous', grouplabels=None, groupcolors=None)[source]#

Adds a colorbar to a MPL figure

Parameters:

  • canvas (mplc.MplCanvas) – canvas object

  • cax (axes) – color axes object

  • cbartype (str) – Type of colorbar, dicrete or continuous, Defaults to continuous

  • grouplabels (list of str, optional) – category/group labels for tick marks

add_scalebar(ax)[source]#

Add a scalebar to a map

Parameters:

ax – Axes to place scalebar on.

change_sample(index, save_analysis=True)[source]#

Changes sample and plots first map

Parameters:

index (int) – index of sample name for identifying data.

execute_code(output_text_edit, code=None)[source]#
get_field_list(set_name='Analyte')[source]#

Gets the fields associated with a defined set

Set names are consistent with QComboBox.

Parameters:

set_name (str, optional) – name of set list, options include Analyte, Analyte (normalized), Ratio, Calcualated Field, PCA Score, Cluster, Cluster Score, Special, Defaults to Analyte

Returns:

Set_fields, a list of fields within the input set

Return type:

list

get_saved_lists(type)[source]#

Retrieves the names of saved analyte lists from the resources/analytes list directory.

Returns:

List of saved analyte list names.

Return type:

list

get_scatter_data(plot_type, field_type=None, field=None, processed=True, field_type_x=None, field_type_y=None, field_type_z=None, field_x=None, field_y=None, field_z=None, color_by_field=None)[source]#
histogram_get_range(field_type, field)[source]#

Updates the bin width

Generally called when the number of bins is changed by the user. Updates the plot.

histogram_update_n_bins(field, field_type)[source]#

Updates the number of bins

Generally called when the bin width is changed by the user. Updates the plot.

open_field_selector_dialog()[source]#

Opens Select Analyte dialog

Opens a dialog to select analytes for analysis either graphically or in a table. Selection updates the list of analytes, and ratios in plot selector and comboBoxes.

See also

AnalyteSelectionWindow for the dialog

open_select_analyte_dialog()[source]#

Opens Select Analyte dialog

Opens a dialog to select analytes for analysis either graphically or in a table. Selection updates the list of analytes, and ratios in plot selector and comboBoxes.

See also

AnalyteSelectionWindow for the dialog

plot_correlation(corr_method, squared=False, field_type=None, field=None)[source]#

Creates an image of the correlation matrix

plot_histogram(hist_type, field_type, field, n_bins)[source]#

Plots a histogramn in the canvas window

refresh_saved_lists_dropdown(type)[source]#

Calls the JavaScript function to refresh the analyteSavedListsDropdown in Blockly.

reset_analysis(selection='full')[source]#
store_sample_ids()[source]#

Sends sample_ids to JavaScript to update the sample_ids list and refresh dropdowns.

update_analyte_ratio_selection(analyte_dict)[source]#

Updates analytes/ratios in mainwindow and its corresponding scale used for each field

Updates analytes/ratios and its corresponding scale used for each field based on selection made by user in Analyteselection window or if user choses analyte list in blockly

Parameters:
analyte_dict: dict

key: Analyte/Ratio name value: scale used (linear/log/logit)

update_analyte_selection_from_file(filename)[source]#
update_axis_limits(style_dict, field=None)[source]#
update_blockly_analyte_dropdown(filename, unsaved_changes)[source]#

update analyte/ratio lists dropdown with the selected analytes/ratios

Parameters:
filename: str

filename returned from analyte selection window

saved: bool

if the user saved was saved by user

update_blockly_field_types(workflow=None)[source]#
Gets the fields types available and invokes workflow function

which updates field type dropdown in blockly workflow

Set names are consistent with QComboBox.

update_bounds(ub=None, lb=None, d_ub=None, d_lb=None)[source]#
update_field_list_from_file(filename)[source]#
update_field_type_combobox(comboBox, addNone=False, plot_type='')[source]#

Updates field type combobox

Used to update MainWindow.comboBoxHistFieldType, MainWindow.comboBoxFilterFieldType, MainWindow.comboBoxFieldTypeX, MainWindow.comboBoxFieldTypeY, MainWindow.comboBoxFieldTypeZ, and MainWindow.comboBoxColorByField

Parameters:

  • combobox (QComboBox) – The combobox to update.

  • addNone (bool) – Adds None to the top of the combobox list

  • plot_type (str) – The plot type helps to define the set of field types available, by default '' (no change)
